summary: This bill, the Law On Offender Transgressions during Emergencies and Recovery Act of 2025 (LOOTER Act), amends Title 18 of the United States Code to punish larceny during natural disasters. It specifies penalties for petit larceny (up to 1 year imprisonment and/or a fine) and grand larceny (up to 5 years imprisonment and/or a fine) committed in a state county during an emergency declared under the Stafford Disaster Relief Act.
